attributes.action: Allow the BBC to become independent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is no longer the voice of the people, the current licence fee is iniquitous, even more so under the current financial conditions when it favours the current government. It does not fulfill the role that it should.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
